  • Uses of Stop in org.jgrapes.io

    Methods in org.jgrapes.io with parameters of type Stop
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void FileStorage.onStop​(Stop event)
    Handle stop by closing all files.
    void InputStreamMonitor.onStop​(Stop event)
    Stops the thread that reads data from the input stream.
    void NioDispatcher.onStop​(Stop event)
    Stops the thread that is associated with this dispatcher.

    Methods in org.jgrapes.net with parameters of type Stop
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void TcpServer.onStop​(Stop event)
    Shuts down the server by firing a Close using the server as channel.
